lines.gurmukhi: jYsy inrml drpn mY n icqR kCU skl cirqR icqR dyKq idKwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Niramal Darapan Mai N Chitr Kachhoo , Sakal Charitr Chitr Daykhat Dikhaavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a clean mirror has no image in it, but when one looks in it, it shows all the details in their true colours,

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy inrml jl brn AqIq rIq skl brn imil brn bnwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Niramal Jal Baran Ateet Reeta , Sakal Baran Mili Baran Banaavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as clean water is bereft of all shades of colours, but acquires the colour that it mixes with,

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qau bsuMDrw suAwd bwsnw rihq AauKDI Anyk rs gMD aupjwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Tau Basoundharaa Suaad Baasanaa Rahita , Aoukhadhee Anayk Ras Gandh Oupajaavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as Earth is free of all tastes and desires but produces myriads of herbs of different effects, plants capable of giving many types of medicinal and aromatic extracts,

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gurdyv syv AlK AByv giq jYsy jYso Bwau qYsI kwmnw pujwveI ]330]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Gurdayv Sayv Alakh Abhayv Gati , Jaisay Jaiso Bhaau Taisee Kaamanaa Pujaavaee ?330?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly with whatever sentiment one performs service of indescribable and inaccessible Lord-like True Guru, one's desires are filled accordingly. (330)
